# Class SentenceStream

Class for processing text stream into sentences. Provides functionality to stream text data sentence by sentence.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

destroy get next create

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new SentenceStream(sentenceStream: any): [SentenceStream]()

Creates a new SentenceStream instance.

#### Parameters

    * sentenceStream: any

External reference to the native sentence stream implementation

#### Returns [SentenceStream]()




## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this sentence stream.

#### Returns void




### get

  * get(): any

Returns the external reference to the native sentence stream implementation.

#### Returns any

External reference object




### next

  * next(): Promise<  
{ done: boolean; text: any }  
| { done: boolean; text?: undefined },  
>

Asynchronously reads the next sentence from the stream.

#### Returns Promise<{ done: boolean; text: any } | { done: boolean; text?: undefined }>

Promise resolving to a result object with text content or done flag

#### Throws

InworldError if reading from the stream fails




### `Static`create

  * create(inputStream: any): Promise<any>

Creates a new SentenceStream from an input stream.

#### Parameters

    * inputStream: any

External reference to the input stream

#### Returns Promise<any>

Promise resolving to a new SentenceStream instance

#### Throws

InworldError if sentence stream creation fails
